name: Introduction to React
description: Learn the fundamentals of React components, props, and state management.

lessons.name: React Components
lessons.description: Understand functional and class components.

lessons.name: JSX and Rendering
lessons.description: Learn how JSX translates to React elements.

lessons.name: Props and State
lessons.description: Manage dynamic data in React applications.

name: Data Analysis Foundations
description: Use analytics tools to interpret and visualize supply chain data.

lessons.name: Data Cleaning
lessons.description: Preparing data for accurate analysis.

lessons.name: Descriptive Analytics
lessons.description: Summarizing and visualizing data trends.

lessons.name: Predictive Models
lessons.description: Forecasting outcomes using regression and machine learning.

name: Negotiation Principles
description: Learn strategies for effective supplier negotiation.

lessons.name: Supplier Evaluation
lessons.description: Assessing suppliers based on cost, quality, and delivery.

lessons.name: Negotiation Tactics
lessons.description: Key techniques for achieving win-win outcomes.

lessons.name: Contract Management
lessons.description: Managing supplier contracts post-negotiation.

name: Programming Basics
description: Learn to write clean and efficient Python code.

lessons.name: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Introduction to Python syntax and data types.

lessons.name: Functions and Loops
lessons.description: Control flow and modular programming.

lessons.name: Lists and Dictionaries
lessons.description: Storing and manipulating collections of data.

name: Object-Oriented Design
description: Explore classes, objects, and inheritance in programming.

lessons.name: Classes and Objects
lessons.description: How to define and instantiate classes.

lessons.name: Encapsulation and Inheritance
lessons.description: Building reusable and maintainable code.

lessons.name: Recursion and Data Structures
lessons.description: Recursive problem solving with lists and trees.

name: Logic and Proofs
description: Develop mathematical reasoning through formal proofs.

lessons.name: Propositional Logic
lessons.description: Understanding logical statements and truth tables.

lessons.name: Set Theory
lessons.description: Working with sets, subsets, and operations.

lessons.name: Induction Proofs
lessons.description: Learning mathematical induction.

name: Corporate Strategy
description: Understand how businesses plan and implement long-term goals.

lessons.name: Competitive Advantage
lessons.description: Exploring what makes firms stand out in markets.

lessons.name: Strategic Analysis

lessons.name: Execution and Change

name: Team Dynamics
description: Understand how people collaborate in organizations.

lessons.name: Motivation Theories
lessons.description: What drives individuals to perform effectively.

lessons.name: Leadership Styles
lessons.description: Different approaches to managing and leading teams.

lessons.name: Communication in Teams
